We are providing you with this Privacy Notice to explain our practices regarding the collection, use, and other processing of certain individually identifiable information about you (\\\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"personal data\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\\") pursuant to Law No.81/2018 (the E-Transactions and Data Protection Law).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\nEPAM is the \\\"person responsible for the collection of your personal data\\\" within the meaning of the E-Transactions and Data Protection Law. This means that we are responsible for deciding the purposes for which personal data about you are processed and the means we use to carry such processing activities out. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\nPursuant to the E-Transactions and Data Protection Law, we are required to notify you of the information contained in this privacy notice prior to collecting any personal data which forms an integral part of the data collection form. It is important that you read this privacy notice so that you are aware of how and why we process your personal data.\\nï»¿\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
